statements: UPDATE pharm_sales_data SET sale_amount = 150.00 WHERE product_id = 'fa36ccab-e6b3-4a24-a6f4-6a1b09f98e2c';
UPDATE pharm_sales_data SET sale_amount = 200.00 WHERE location = 'New York';
UPDATE pharm_sales_data SET product_name = 'Paracetamol' WHERE product_id = 'dc3cbe8f-9cea-4653-b3e7-06a585f7f106';
UPDATE pharm_sales_data SET sale_amount = sale_amount * 1.1 WHERE location = 'New York';
UPDATE pharm_sales_data SET sale_amount = sale_amount - 50 WHERE product_name LIKE '%Cold%';
UPDATE pharm_sales_data SET sale_amount = 0 WHERE sale_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE market_trends SET revenue_change = 0.05 WHERE trend_id = 3;
UPDATE sales_data SET product_name = 'New Product' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity = quantity + 5, revenue = revenue + 100.50 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE sales_data SET revenue = revenue * 1.1 WHERE sales_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE market_trends SET revenue_change = revenue_change * 0.9, market_share = market_share + 0.05 WHERE month_year = '2022-03-01';
UPDATE Sales SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE sale_id = 123;
UPDATE Products SET price = 29.99 WHERE product_id = 456;
UPDATE Customers SET phone_number = '555-1234' WHERE customer_id = 789;
UPDATE Sales SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE product_name = 'Product A' AND sale_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE Products SET price = price * 1.05 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE Customers SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE product_sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 10 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE product_inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 5 WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE sales_rep SET territory = 'East Coast' WHERE rep_id = 301;
UPDATE product_sales SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 10, revenue = revenue * 1.15 WHERE product_id = 101 AND sales_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE product_inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 5, last_stock_update = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE sales_rep SET territory = 'East Coast', hire_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE rep_id = 301;
UPDATE sales_data SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE sale_id = 'e6122d4d-cc98-4ec9-b2f7-49181ec05572';
UPDATE product SET unit_price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = '7362bcdb-7b3a-4914-8be1-29d6480fa65d';
UPDATE revenue SET revenue_amount = 1500.75 WHERE revenue_id = 'a8306584-4806-4a76-aeff-51e52d955f6f';
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE sale_id = 'e5bb0d3c-3494-475e-80e1-23e2b205f67d';
UPDATE product SET unit_price = unit_price * 1.1 WHERE category = 'Electronics';
UPDATE revenue SET revenue_amount = revenue_amount - 1000 WHERE sale_id IN (SELECT sale_id FROM sales_data WHERE amount > 5000);
